value.name: What Detroit sports pros are saying about Michael Jordan and the ‘The Last Dance’
value.description: On Sunday night, ESPN aired the first two episodes of The Last Dance to much fanfare. Many Detroit Pistons fans are eager to see how the Bad Boys will be portrayed in the miniseries. So far though, the producers have focused on setting the scene for Michael Jordan’s final season with the Chicago Bulls. The 10-part series continues through May ...

value.name: What we learned from Detroit Pistons' 2019-20 season and what it means for future
value.description: April 14 was supposed to be a notable date for the Detroit Pistons. It would’ve marked the end of the 2019-20 season, and the beginning of a potentially transformative offseason for the franchise. The suspension of the season on March 11 changed that,

value.name: Detroit Pistons rookie Sekou Doumbouya back home in France
value.description: The Detroit Pistons say rookie Sekou Doumbouya is back in France while NBA play is on hold because of the coronavirus crisis. The league recommended players avoid non-essential travel, but players — in concert with their team — could choose to go to another city and stay there. International travel could lead to logistical concerns if play ...

value.name: Whenever draft and free agency roll around, Pistons will 'no doubt be prepared'
value.description: The Pistons have acquired a number of young players – nine still under 25 – since Ed Stefanski took over the front office a little less than two years ago. Some or most of them will be instrumental in taking the next steps as they launch a rebuilding phase. Stefanski picked up Christian Wood off waivers. He’s drafted Sekou Doumbouya ...

value.name: Greg Kelser, Rod Beard rank greatest Detroit Pistons of all time
value.description: Greg Kelser, Rod Beard rank greatest Detroit Pistons of all time The two championship teams — the “Bad Boys” and the “Goin’ to Work” squad — are represented well, with six players coming from those eras. Check out this story on detroitnews.com: https://www.detroitnews.com/story/sports/nba/pistons/2020/04/16/best-best-ranking-10 ...

value.name: Will The Detroit Pistons Regret Missing Out On Kevin Porter Jr.?
value.description: We've seen this movie before. The Detroit Pistons pass on a promising youngster and that player goes on to make them regret it. Will Kevin Porter Jr. be the next in this long line?
